hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""' | { read fp; if echo "$fp" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js|json|md|yaml|yml)$'; then npx prettier --write "$fp" >/dev/null 2>&1; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""' | { read fp; if echo "$fp" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js)$'; then npx eslint --fix "$fp" >/dev/null 2>&1 || npx eslint "$fp" 2>&1; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | if grep -qE 'git\s+commit.*--no-verify'; then echo 'Never use --no-verify with git commit.' >&2; exit 2; fi
